The stress of deadlines and responsibilities crept into her dreams, leaving her exhausted by morning.

Desperate for relief, Clara began her quest for better sleep. She scoured the internet, reading articles about sleep hygiene, meditation, and natural remedies. One day, she stumbled upon the concept of a sleep yukata. Intrigued, she read about how this traditional Japanese garment was designed for comfort, promoting relaxation and restful sleep.
